SELECT nn.`NEWSID` 'newsId', nn.`TITLE` 'title', nn.`NEWSSOURCE` 'nSource', nn.`DECLAREDATE` 'declareDate', nn.`UPDATETIME` 'updateDate', nn. `UTSID` 'utsId'
FROM news_newsinfo nn WHERE nn.`NEWSID`>0 limit ?,?

SELECT aa.`ANNOUNCEMENTID` 'annId', aa.`TITLE` 'title', aa.`DECLAREDATE` 'declareDate', aa.`UPDATETIME` 'updateDate', aa.`ANNOUNCEMENTROUTE` 'attach', aa. `UTSID` 'utsId' FROM ann_announcementinfo aa WHERE aa.`ANNOUNCEMENTID`>0 limit ?,?

SELECT ri.`REPORTID` 'reportId', ri.`TITLE` 'title', ri.`DECLAREDATE` 'declareDate', ri.`UPDATETIME` 'updateDate', ri.`FILESTORAGEPATH` 'attach', ri. `UTSID` 'utsId' FROM rep_reportinfo ri WHERE REPORTID>0 limit ?,?

SELECT nn.`NEWSID` 'newsId', nn.`TITLE` 'title', nn.`NEWSSOURCE` 'nSource', nn.`DECLAREDATE` 'declareDate', nn.`UPDATETIME` 'updateDate', nn. `UTSID` 'utsId'
FROM news_newsinfo nn WHERE nn.NEWSID>0 AND nn.NEWSID=?

SELECT nn.`NEWSID` 'newsId', nn.`TITLE` 'title', nn.`NEWSSOURCE` 'nSource', nn.`DECLAREDATE` 'declareDate', nn.`UPDATETIME` 'updateDate', nn. `UTSID` 'utsId'
FROM news_newsinfo nn INNER JOIN news_classify nc ON nc.NEWSID=nn.NEWSID WHERE nc.UTSID=? AND nn.NEWSID>0

SELECT nn.`NEWSID` 'newsId', nn.`TITLE` 'title', nn.`NEWSSOURCE` 'nSource', nn.`DECLAREDATE` 'declareDate', nn.`UPDATETIME` 'updateDate', nn. `UTSID` 'utsId'
FROM news_newsinfo nn INNER JOIN news_industry ni ON ni.NEWSID=nn.NEWSID WHERE ni.UTSID=? AND nn.NEWSID>0

SELECT nn.`NEWSID` 'newsId', nn.`TITLE` 'title', nn.`NEWSSOURCE` 'nSource', nn.`DECLAREDATE` 'declareDate', nn.`UPDATETIME` 'updateDate', nn. `UTSID` 'utsId'
FROM news_newsinfo nn INNER JOIN news_security ns ON ns.NEWSID=nn.NEWSID WHERE ns.UTSID=? AND nn.NEWSID>0

SELECT nn.`NEWSID` 'newsId', nn.`TITLE` 'title', nn.`NEWSSOURCE` 'nSource', nn.`DECLAREDATE` 'declareDate', nn.`UPDATETIME` 'updateDate', nn. `UTSID` 'utsId'
FROM news_newsinfo nn INNER JOIN #tableName# tb ON tb.NEWSID=nn.NEWSID WHERE tb.UTSID=? AND nn.NEWSID>0

SELECT aa.`ANNOUNCEMENTID` 'annId', aa.`TITLE` 'title', aa.`DECLAREDATE` 'declareDate', aa.`UPDATETIME` 'updateDate', aa.`ANNOUNCEMENTROUTE` 'attach', aa. `UTSID` 'utsId' FROM ann_announcementinfo aa WHERE aa.ANNOUNCEMENTID>0 AND aa.ANNOUNCEMENTID=?

SELECT aa.`ANNOUNCEMENTID` 'annId', aa.`TITLE` 'title', aa.`DECLAREDATE` 'declareDate', aa.`UPDATETIME` 'updateDate', aa.`ANNOUNCEMENTROUTE` 'attach', aa. `UTSID` 'utsId' FROM ann_announcementinfo aa INNER JOIN #tableName# tb ON tb.ANNOUNCEMENTID=aa.ANNOUNCEMENTID WHERE aa.ANNOUNCEMENTID>0 AND tb.UTSID=?

SELECT ri.`REPORTID` 'reportId', ri.`TITLE` 'title', ri.`DECLAREDATE` 'declareDate', ri.`UPDATETIME` 'updateDate', ri.`FILESTORAGEPATH` 'attach', ri. `UTSID` 'utsId' FROM rep_reportinfo ri WHERE ri.REPORTID>0 AND ri.REPORTID=?

SELECT ri.`REPORTID` 'reportId', ri.`TITLE` 'title', ri.`DECLAREDATE` 'declareDate', ri.`UPDATETIME` 'updateDate', ri.`FILESTORAGEPATH` 'attach', ri.`UTSID` 'utsId' FROM rep_reportinfo ri INNER JOIN #tableName# tb ON tb.REPORTID=ri.REPORTID WHERE ri.REPORTID>0 AND tb.UTSID=?
SELECT CLASSIFYID classifyId FROM news_classify WHERE NEWSID>0 AND NEWSID=?
SELECT SYMBOL symbol FROM news_security WHERE NEWSID>0 AND NEWSID=?
SELECT INDUSTRYCODE code FROM news_industry WHERE NEWSID>0 AND NEWSID=?

SELECT k.SYMBOL AS 'symbol', k.INDUSTRYCODE AS 'industry' FROM stk_industryclass k INNER JOIN ( SELECT INSTITUTIONID, MAX(CHANGEDATE) AS CHANGEDATE FROM stk_industryclass WHERE INDUSTRYCLASSIFICATIONID = 'P0207' GROUP BY INSTITUTIONID ) AS v ON k.`INSTITUTIONID` = v.INSTITUTIONID AND k.CHANGEDATE = v.CHANGEDATE WHERE k.INDUSTRYCLASSIFICATIONID='P0207'
SELECT CLASSIFYID classifyId FROM ann_classify WHERE ANNOUNCEMENTID>0 AND ANNOUNCEMENTID=?
SELECT SYMBOL symbol FROM ann_security WHERE ANNOUNCEMENTID>0 AND ANNOUNCEMENTID=?
SELECT CATEGORYCODE id FROM rep_category WHERE REPORTID>0 AND REPORTID=? UNION SELECT SUBSTRING(INDUSTRYCODE , 1 ,1) id FROM rep_industry WHERE REPORTID>0 AND REPORTID=?
SELECT SYMBOL symbol FROM rep_security WHERE REPORTID>0 AND REPORTID=?
SELECT INSTITUTIONID id FROM rep_institution WHERE REPORTID>0 AND REPORTID=?
SELECT INDUSTRYCODE code FROM rep_industry WHERE REPORTID>0 AND REPORTID=?
